properties.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued March 1 at 7:07PM CST by NWS San Angelo TX
properties.description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED...AT THE REQUEST OF THE
TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY.

THE FARMERS BRANCH, POLICE DEPARTMENT, IS SEARCHING FOR PRINCESS
JONELLE SCARLETT. SHE IS BLACK AND 4 YEARS OLD. SHE IS 3 FEET, AND
SHE WEIGHS 35 POUNDS. SHE HAS BROWN HAIR, WITH MULTI-COLORED
BEADS. SHE HAS BROWN EYES, AND SHE IS WEARING A WHITE SHIRT, WITH
A MERMAID IN THE MIDDLE. SHE IS WEARING BLUE JEANS AND BLACK AND
PINK NIKES. LAW ENFORCEMENT IS ALSO SEARCHING FOR PRESTON JEREMY
SCARLETT. HE IS BLACK AND 5 YEARS OLD. HE IS 4 FEET, AND HE WEIGHS
42 POUNDS. HE HAS BROWN EYES AND BROWN MOHAWK HAIR. HE IS WEARING
A BLUE SHIRT, BLUE JEANS, WITH A RIP, AND BLACK NIKES.

THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BURGUNDY, 2016, GMC, TERRAIN. THE
TEXAS, LICENSE PLATE NUMBER IS, H...F...L...1...5...2...5. IT HAS
A BLACK QUARTER PANEL, A RED PASSENGER DOOR, AND IS MISSING THE
FRONT BUMPER.

THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM IN FARMERS BRANCH, TEXAS.

LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR
IMMEDIATE DANGER.

IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE
FARMERS BRANCH POLICE DEPARTMENT, AT,
4...6...9...2...8...9...3...2...7...0.

NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS FARMERS BRANCH POLICE DEPARTMENT,
AT, 4...6...9...2...8...9...3...2...7...0.
